meanings.definition: The quality of being discreet or careful in one's actions or speech.
meanings.sent1: Her discreetness in handling sensitive information impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent2: It is important to maintain discreetness when discussing confidential matters.
meanings.sent3: His discreetness was so remarkable that he could keep a secret even from himself.
meanings.sent4: The discreetness of the spy was akin to a shadow, unseen and unheard.
meanings.sent5: The discreetness of the ninja was legendary, moving through the night like a whisper.

meanings.definition: The state of being discreet or showing good judgment in behavior.
meanings.sent1: The discreetness of her decisions reflected her wise judgment.
meanings.sent2: In a position of leadership, one must exhibit discreetness in all actions.
meanings.sent3: The discreetness of the squirrel in stealing nuts was both sneaky and clever.
meanings.sent4: The discreetness of the chameleon in blending into its surroundings was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The discreetness of the detective in solving the case was like a puzzle master at work.
